content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-288-02-B
|Item_parent=Hemorrhoidal pathology
|Item_parent_short=Hemorrhoidal pathology
|Rank=B
|Title=Knowing the frequency of haemorrhoidal pathology
|Description=
|Rubric=Epidemiology
|Contributors=
|Order=2}}

It is estimated that a third of the French adult population has had at least one haemorrhoidal symptom in the past year, but only a third have sought medical advice.

properties.question: What is the estimated frequency of haemorrhoidal symptoms in the French adult population in the past year, and what proportion of them sought medical advice?
properties.option_a: One-third had symptoms; one-third sought medical advice.
properties.option_b: One-half had symptoms; one-third sought medical advice.
properties.option_c: Two-thirds had symptoms; one-third sought medical advice.
properties.option_d: One-third had symptoms; two-thirds sought medical advice.
